m_list.m_dialog: The Warrior is someone who focuses on brute force and uses their weapons to slay their foes.
The Mage is a caster who focuses on utilizing abilities imbued in their weapons to smite enemies.
Lastly, the Hunter is a person who relies on their speed to outmaneuver their opponents.
Fortunately for you, Searcher, I managed to ingest a rune of Flexibility before I died. Please let me know if you wish to change classes.
